title: Secret Identity
description: Eve is at the top of her game. She’s finally going to make partner at the Ad Agency run by two of her best friends. But when she takes a business trip to wine and dine a potential customer, her boss decides to tag along at the last minute. Now, everything she’s worked hard for, over the last few years, might just disappear in a flash.Carter has had a thing for his friend Eve ever since he could remember. He hired her a few years ago to help boost his business and it’s never run smoother. But when a once in a life time opportunity presents itself, he takes a chance at happiness that could end up destroying their friendship.
author: Jill Sanders
